page.title: 08Attitudes2 Gipsey Bridge
page.content:
This page shows some of the results of a survey into the attitudes of local people to some aspects of modern life.
{Conservation} everyone I spoke to said that we should have more conservation of the wildlife around our area
{Television} nearly all the people in our village said that they dont mind } about television.A few said it was very good but not many.
The majority of people seem quite happy with the way most of these aspects of modern life are moving they are worried by unemployment and lack of care over nature.
